QuestData.Title: The Sinstone Archive
QuestData.Description:
You said Inquisitor Traian oversaw the ritual?
<Archivist Fane searches the massive archives in this chamber.>
We archivists maintain strict records of every soul that passes through these halls.
Or at least we're supposed to. The sinstones of powerful venthyr tend to go "missing."
<Archivist Fane rolls his eyes.>
I don't see his sinstone here. He might've stolen it, or someone could be hoarding it as blackmail.
Help me complete my archives, and I'll get you any sinstone you need.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Archivist Fane's eyes light up when you hand him the archives.>
This is a lot of potential leverage...
